name: Use 50:50 Lifeline
description: Two of the wrong answers are removed, leaving one wrong answer and the correct one to choose from.

name: Use Audience Poll Lifeline
description: The audience will help you in identifying the correct answer among all the options present.

name: Use Freeze Timer Lifeline
description: The timer will be paused for 30 seconds to allow more time to answer the question.

name: Use Flip Question Lifeline
description: The current question will be interchanged with a new question.
